posts.postText:
Offender name?: john191053 and sb666
Which Server?: jail
Offender's Steam ID?: STEAM_0:0:13089494 and STEAM_0:0:11821045
What the Offender did?: freekilled multiple people because we rebelled last round. didnt even give us a chance to leave our cells.
Admins on?: none
Proof?:  http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/596934757502542184/0DE32EADB3490A7A0FADBC7A23DDAFB4123714C8/  http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/596934757502538484/C7A0599094C59382581BB2EC70DFD17630BCB74F/  http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/596934757502539097/7736A46553B73DC28EF4E92FF931F97C28B3A568/  http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/596934757502539794/0A3C712562A532D96B27C14626EA6939AA7FC342/  http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/596934757502535506/8CD339F4DB94B8EF0D0F61E2892A4E59D76EE9D6/  http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/596934757502537042/B5961255C3E2AB9E09A5AF29920A5B7EB08046B4/ 

on all of these you see sb and john freekilling because of us rebelling the previous round. against rules. and in some of them you can see people telling them that they freekill and arguing with them, but they wont listen.

Accepted; Bird played with these two before, they were a bit out of line. So after seeing this, he decided permanent will be the case.

Banned.
